title: Advantage Business at the Supreme Court
itunes:title: Advantage Business at the Supreme Court
description:
Jonathan Macey, a professor at Yale Law School, discusses business wins and losses at the Supreme Court this past term.

Kimberly Strawbridge Robinson, Bloomberg Law Supreme Court reporter, discusses the persistent gender gap at the lectern of the court with male advocates outnumbering female advocates 125 to 28 in the most recent term.

June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
